executable.title: Brain Extraction Tool
executable.description: This CLI module aims to extract the brain from the skull. This tool was intensively tested with T1 MRI images, but the pipeline could be applied to any other structural MRI images, namely T2 and PD. We indicate this tool if you want preserve the white matter, because some times the temporal and/or frontal lobes cortex are cutted from the original data. One way to avoid this problem could be the previous pre-processing pixel intensity normalization and fiel inhomogeneity correction. This module is an adaptation of ROBEX brain extraction tool, given by Iglesias, J. E. et al (2011). "Robust Brain Extraction Across Datasets and Comparison With Publicly Available Methods".
